mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM as rn FROM ( SELECT product_code, product_name, unit_price FROM product_info WHERE product_type = 'PT02' ORDER BY product_code )a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}) page WHERE page.rn >= #{start}
SELECT count(*) FROM product_info WHERE product_type = 'PT02'
SELECT product_color FROM product_option WHERE product_code = #{productCode} GROUP BY product_color

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM as rn FROM ( SELECT supply_plan_detail_code, supply_plan_code, product_code, product_color, product_size, supply_qy, supply_date FROM SUPPLY_PLAN_DETAILS ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) page WHERE page.rn >= #{start}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM as rn FROM (SELECT r.return_code, r.delivery_code, r.company_code, r.company_name, r.requestor, r.request_date, count(p.product_code) as count FROM returns r JOIN return_product p ON r.return_code = p.return_code WHERE p.processing_status = 'ER03' AND p.show = 'on' GROUP BY r.return_code, r.delivery_code, r.company_code, r.company_name, r.requestor, r.request_date ORDER BY r.request_date ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} )page WHERE page.rn >= #{start}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM as rn FROM ( SELECT d.delivery_code, d.order_date, d.dedt, COUNT(i.product_code) AS delivery_qy FROM delivery d JOIN delivery_details i ON d.delivery_code = i.delivery_code WHERE d.company_se = 'CP01' AND i.delivery_qy > 0 GROUP BY d.delivery_code, d.order_date, d.dedt ORDER BY d.delivery_code )a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}) page WHERE page.rn >= #{start}
SELECT count(*) FROM returns r join return_product p on r.return_code = p.return_code WHERE p.processing_status = 'ER03'
select count(delivery_code) from delivery WHERE company_se = 'CP01'

SELECT r.product_code, r.product_name, SUM(r.qy) as qy, SUM(r.qy - NVL(i.store_qy, 0)) as not_store_qy, NVL(sum(i.store_qy),0) as store_qy FROM return_product r left join inventory i on r.return_code = i.return_code AND r.product_code = i.product_code WHERE r.return_code = #{returnCode} GROUP BY r.product_code, r.product_name, i.store_qy

SELECT d.product_code, p.product_name, d.product_color, SUM(DISTINCT d.delivery_qy) as productQy, sum(distinct d.delivery_qy) - sum(nvl(i.store_qy,0)) as qy, SUM(i.store_qy) as totalQy FROM delivery_details d LEFT join inventory i on d.delivery_code = i.delivery_code left join product_info p on d.product_code = p.product_code WHERE d.product_se = 'PT01' AND d.delivery_code = #{deliveryCode} group by d.product_code, p.product_name, d.product_color
SELECT get_comm(product_size) as product_size_info FROM product_option WHERE product_code = #{productCode} GROUP BY product_size ORDER BY product_size

with temp as (SELECT r.product_color, 'sz' || get_comm(r.product_size) as product_size_info, r.product_code, r.qy - NVL(i.store_qy,0) as store_qy FROM return_product r LEFT JOIN inventory i on r.return_code = i.return_code AND r.product_size = i.product_size AND r.product_code = i.product_code AND r.product_color = i.product_color WHERE r.product_code = #{productCode} AND r.return_code = #{returnCode}) select * from temp pivot( sum(store_qy) for product_size_info in (

mapper.select: SELECT sum(DISTINCT d.delivery_qy) - sum(nvl(i.store_qy,0)) as checkQy from delivery_details d left join inventory i on d.delivery_code = i.delivery_code WHERE d.product_se = 'PT01' AND i.delivery_code = #{delivery_code}

SELECT NVL(sum(i.store_qy),0) + NVL(sum(e.error_qy),0) as total, sum(d.delivery_qy) as request_qy FROM inventory i left join inventory_error e on i.delivery_code = e.delivery_code and i.product_code = e.product_code left join delivery_details d on i.delivery_code = d.delivery_code WHERE i.delivery_code = #{deliveryCode}
